member.name: T:Owin.CorsExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for adding CorsMiddleware to an application pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.CorsExtensions.UseCors(Owin.IAppBuilder,Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsOptions)
member.summary: Adds a CORS middleware to your web application pipeline to allow cross domain requests.
member.param: The IAppBuilder passed to your configuration method
An options class that controls the middleware behavior

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsMiddleware
member.summary: Processes requests according to the provided cross domain policy.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsMiddleware.#ctor(Microsoft.Owin.OwinMiddleware,Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of CorsMiddleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsMiddleware.Invoke(Microsoft.Owin.IOwinContext)
member.summary: Evaluates and applies the CORS policy. Responses will be generated for preflight requests. Requests that are permitted by the CORS policy will be passed onto the next middleware.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsOptions
member.summary: Contains the options used by the CorsMiddleware

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsOptions.AllowAll
member.summary: A policy that allows all headers, all methods, any origin and supports credentials

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsPolicyProvider
member.summary: A pluggable CORS policy provider that always returns null by default.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.ICorsPolicyProvider
member.summary: Defines how to select a CORS policy for a given request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.ICorsPolicyProvider.GetCorsPolicyAsync(Microsoft.Owin.IOwinRequest)
member.summary: Selects a CORS policy to apply for the given request.
member.returns: The CORS policy to apply to the request, or null if no policy applies and the request should be passed through to the next middleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsPolicyProvider.GetCorsPolicyAsync(Microsoft.Owin.IOwinRequest)
member.summary: Executes the PolicyResolver unless overridden by a subclass.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Cors.CorsPolicyProvider.PolicyResolver
member.summary: A pluggable callback that will be used to select the CORS policy for the given requests.
